definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Position the hose at a downspout drain to discharge then let go of the crimp.
sentences.chinese: 位置处于降排水软管燃放然后放过了卷曲。

sentences.english: Examine the host for dents, kinks, deformation or chafing.
sentences.chinese: 检查软管是否有凹坑，纽结，变形或擦伤。

sentences.english: If buying an icer tip, you want a 2-inch kwik icer tube.
sentences.chinese: 如果买个冷凝器就需要一个2英寸的冷凝软管。

sentences.english: The Flow Through System Pump is fixed-speed, self priming peristaltic pump.
sentences.chinese: 流经泵系统包括有固定的速率，自我启动的软管泵。

sentences.english: Stiff rings around the tube mimicked the structure of a human trachea.
sentences.chinese: 围绕在软管周围的硬环则模拟了人类气管的结构。

sentences.english: Our products mainly cover aluminum flexible tubes and cartons for packing.
sentences.chinese: 本公司主要生产铝质软管及包装用纸箱。

sentences.english: I noticed a woman on the factory floor putting nozzles onto rubber hoses.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到一位女士在车间里正往塑料软管上装喷嘴。

sentences.english: Anti-heat vacuum soft tube prevents damage from hot nozzle.
sentences.chinese: 防热真空软管免被热焊咀熔坏。

sentences.english: HRE clamps are designed as hose and tube supports for high cyclic pressure applications.
sentences.chinese: 人权教育夹具设计的软管和高循环压力管的应用支持。

sentences.english: The invention relates to an automobile turbocharging circuit hose and a method for manufacturing the same.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及汽车用涡轮增压回路软管及制造方法。

sentences.english: It is mounted in a cabinet which connects to the Still Assembly via flexible hoses .
sentences.chinese: 安装在一个真空柜内并和蒸馏器模块用软管相连。

sentences.english: Full set of clips, hose, safety valve, suction cups etc.
sentences.chinese: 回形管，软管，安全阀，吸盘等。

sentences.english: Tubes and covers made of polyester, polyamide and other polymers for mechanical protection and sound reduction.
sentences.chinese: 能够起到机械保护和减低噪音效果的软管和管套。

sentences.english: The prose author' s diagnosis discloses that the hose is damaged.
sentences.chinese: 散文作者的诊断透露软管被损坏。
连接到芯子的软管松脱。

sentences.english: Some types of hose connections utilize clips to prevent them from accidentally becoming uncoupled.
sentences.chinese: 部分类型的软管连接利用线夹来防止连接意外中断。

definition: Guanzi or Guan Zhong 管仲 (-645 BC), famous politician of Qi 齊國|齐国 of Spring and Autumn period/Guanzi, classical book containing writings of Guan Zhong and his school
